title: Freelance Video Editor
shortIntro: We are seeking a skilled editor to join our independent film team on a freelance basis.
responsibilities: Edit long form and short form projects for films, trailers, and online content.
Collaborate closely with directors to refine story, rhythm, and emotional beats.
Prepare masters and deliveries in formats required for platforms and festivals.
requirements: Strong experience with Adobe Premiere Pro.
A portfolio or reel that demonstrates narrative and documentary editing.
Comfort working within indie style, resourceful production environments.
howToApply: Email hank@sanrokuku.com with links to previous work and a short introduction.
Please highlight any feature length or series work you have done.
